config:
model = dict(
    type='ImageClassifier',
    backbone=dict(
        type='SwinTransformer',
        arch='tiny',
        init_cfg=dict(
            type='Pretrained',

        img_size=224,

    neck=dict(type='GlobalAveragePooling'),

        type='LinearClsHead',

        in_channels=768,

        cal_acc=False),
    init_cfg=[

        dict(type='Constant', layer='LayerNorm', val=1.0, bias=0.0)

    train_cfg=dict(augments=[
